Do you love nightmares? Do you love horror, lore, and sacrificial hooks? If you said yes to any of those, this is the game for you. I personally love the game because it allows me to (legally) murder my friends or random people, but the cosmetics, crazy lore, and challenges are fun too. A lot of people take this game way too seriously and rage about it. oh well. :I

spooky fun, I like

It's a decent game but it's always had its problems, even from the beginning. The constant lag spikes, incomprehensibly long waiting times for public matches, killers and survivors usually being broken until they're either nerfed into pure garbage or at least viable. In all honesty, despite all these flaws, this game lives on because of the impact it had on the horror genre. It brings fans of horror movies and games together for a wild ride of original characters, old faces, and a few surprises along the way.
Do something about campers/tunnelers. You balancing this game more and more killer side only, forcing us to be SWF

I wouldn't waste money on this game if it was sold for a penny. The servers shut down all the time, the killer gets preferred server access, and then they wont even give you back your items you brought in. OH, and don't forget the ban each time you DC your fault or not ..... wow, how funn. The absolute cherry on top, is killers can face camp so close you're not sure whos hooked them or you. But it's allowed, it's a "STRAT" ... yup. So no one can unhook you because the killer is body blocking or knocks you down too ... weeeeeeeeee how great.

Primeiramente eu acho que muitas pessoas estão equivocadas. Aqui as pessoas acham que o jogo favorece somente os survivors, no facebook favorece só os killers. Primeiramente o objetivo não é só matar todo mundo (killer) ou fugir (survivor), mas sim cumprir com os requisitos de emblemas, onde escapar vivo é só uma entre outras, assim como o killer matar.

Eu acho que o desbalanço do jogo as vezes saudável, onde o real favorecimento é do killer. Um killer realmente bom, não importa o quão bom o survivor seja. Afinal, para um jogo de sobrevivência, você quer sempre sair vivo? dãã baixa um jogo de pique-esconde então.

Полная помойка, то хит за 3 метра, то многоуважаемые бихейвор наебнут свои сервера так, что через каждую 4-5 катку всех вместе с маном кикает нахер из игры + снимает капли. Обновы это вообще рулетка, каждый раз думаешь: "Наебнут они свою игру опять или нет?" А система рангов... Мммм так и чувствуешь вкус дерьма.

The game is hot garbage. Your teammates will get you killed, they wont touch gens, differences in ping can lead to stupid hits from the killer connecting, and pallets are still filled with disappointment. Don' even get me started on killer queue time during the day, if you want to play that, you'll have to wait until at least 9pm-5am. Even still, this game is extremely fun. Looping can be halarious sometimes, matchmaking with friends works well, and each match is different for the most part. Different perks and maps and killers add up to near infinite replay ability. Paired with the tomes and new content releases with other horror games and it all adds up to a great experience(For the most part).
匹配机制和段位系统做的很糟糕

Bought the game kind of on a whim. I had seen the trailers, the fan art, the let's plays, and always WANTED to buy it, but never got around to it. I really, REALLY regret waiting so long to get this game! The game is a ton of fun once you get a grasp on what you're doing, but it's not perfect. Some frame rate/glitches can be frustrating, and there's no training mode, meaning once you buy a killer/survivor, you're thrown into the deep end to learn how they work. That's not terrible, but some cases I wish there was a way to learn the ropes. Still, I highly, highly recommend the game. 

Also, if you're looking for DLC reccs, Leatherface (Barbecue and Chilli is the best perk, hands down) and Chains of Hate.
I know this game gets a lot of flack but honestly once you stop caring it's really fun.

This is my favorite game.

游戏是好游戏，各方面都是不错的，画质啊什么的都很不错，但就是匹配机制太坑了，萌新没打几把全都是高段位的。如果你是新手，没有玩过这类游戏的基础的话（比如第五人格），建议不要买这个游戏，买了也没有什么好的体验。只会气得砸电脑，这不是危言耸听，是真的。当然，如果你有超好的心态，和大量的时间且很有耐心，那你可以玩，毕竟这游戏的人物都是要培养很久的，给个参考（是其他大佬的），养一个屠夫到能玩的大概要50小时以上。

Постоянные проблемы с серверами, может выкинуть во время катки, и ИГРА ЭТО СЧИТАЕТ КАК ВАШЕ ДЕЗЕРТИРСТВО НАВЕШИВАЯ ШТРАФ НА ПОИСК ИГРЫ!!!!!!  Есть откровенно читерские убийцы, например призрак. В остальном интиресно, атмосферно, фаново!)
